a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Poverty: Share of population living on less than $2 a day (after vs.
This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.

Note: This data is expressed in
international-$
at 2021 prices.
